name: Sameer Qasim Solar System Assignment
description:
This is my University of michigan's game design course assignment of Solar system. You can touch planets to lock camera to it. I have included following aspects and game objects in this simulation;

  • Splash screen with university and my name
  • Sun
  • Mercury
  • Venus
  • Earth with moon
  • Mars
  • Jupiter
  • Saturn with ring
  • Uranus with ring
  • Neptune
  • Comets
  • Custom Cursor

Credits

Made by Sameer Qasim
